metadata.title: Apple Mac OS 10.11 is installed
metadata.description: The operating system installed on the system is Apple Mac OS 10.11.

criterion.comment: The installed operating system is part of the Mac OS family
/System/Library/CoreServices/SystemVersion.plist!ProductVersion is greater than or equal to 10.11 and less than 10.12

metadata.title: Microsoft Windows is installed
metadata.description: The operating system installed on the system is Microsoft Windows

criterion.comment: the installed operating system is part of the Microsoft Windows family

metadata.title: Microsoft Windows 7 is installed
metadata.description: The operating system installed on the system is Microsoft Windows 7

criterion.comment: the installed operating system is part of the Microsoft Windows family

metadata.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 3, 4, 5, 6, or 7
metadata.description: The operating system installed on the system is Red Hat Enterprise Linux 3, 4, 5, 6, or 7

criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 3, 4, 5, 6, or 7 is installed

ind-def:family_test.comment: The installed operating system is part of the Mac OS family

macos:plist510_test.comment: /System/Library/CoreServices/SystemVersion.plist!ProductVersion is greater than or equal to 10.11 and less than 10.12

family_test.comment: the installed operating system is part of the Microsoft Windows family
installed operating system is part of the Unix family

family_object.comment: This is the default family object. Only one family object should exist.

registry_object.comment: This registry key identifies the Windows ProductName
registry_object.name: ProductName

macos:plist510_state.comment: Value is greater than or equal to 10.11 (/System/Library/CoreServices/SystemVersion.plist!ProductVersion)

registry_state.comment: The registry key matches with Windows 7

notes.note: This CPE Name represents the Windows family
This CPE Name represents version 6.1.7600 of the Windows OS
This CPE Name represents Red Hat Enterprise Linux OS
This CPE Name represents OS X
